ygData.subject: Re: bard seeks advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Rokenn I like it where it is.  A link from them to you might be nice, but host?  Hmm I agree with the others.  They strike me as being often out of date. We
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn I like it where it is. A link from them to you might be nice, but host? Hmm
I agree with the others. They strike me as being often out of date.

We have a link on our guild page to your site. I frequently tell bards about it
because it is such a fantastic resource. Kudos again to you and all the
contributors.

Whatever you decide, it would be nice to avoid a ripple of broken links if possible
=).

Maravana Vireo
51 (very very soon to be 52 finally ;P)
Jus Divinum www.jusdivinum.com
Mithaniel Marr
